tool.name: SAGA.grid_filter.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayFILTER False isArrayFILTER_3X3 False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.grid_filter.4 INPUT $INPUT FILTER $FILTER ABSOLUTE $ABSOLUTE FILTER_3X3 $FILTER_3X3 prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: FILTER
param.label: Filter Matrix
param.help: Filter Matrix The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FILTER_3X3
param.label: Default Filter Matrix (3x3)
param.help: Default Filter Matrix (3x3) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: User defined filter matrix. The filter can be chosen from loaded tables. If not specified a fixed table with 3 rows (and 3 columns) will be used.
